Text: North Atlantic Books:  Genres published by North Atlantic Books include internal martial arts (through its imprint "Blue Snake Books"), somatics, homeopathic medicine, shamanism, Martian mysteries, alternative medicine, the history and philosophy of medicine, natural foods, New Science, Buddhism, parapsychology, Western esotericism, Sufism, deep ecology, gay and lesbian studies, conspiracy theories and Jungian psychology.
